    • Method Detail

      • run

        public java.lang.String run(ModelEntity modelEntity,
                            ModelIndex modelIndex,
                            DatabaseUtil dbUtil)
        Description copied from interface: IndexAlternativeAction
        This method is used to perform alternative actions on index before it is created. Mostly to create the index yourself depending on the database type. You have to notice that alternative action can only happen if index is not created.

        CONTRACT: Run MUST handle index creation AND persist its original name OR ofBiz will attain to recreate it every time JIRA starts. HINT: see DatabaseUtil.createDeclaredIndex(ModelEntity, ModelIndex) to experience ofBiz index creation.

        Specified by:
        run in interface IndexAlternativeAction
        Parameters:
        modelEntity - model of entity containing index
        modelIndex - model of index we want to handle alternatively
        dbUtil - database helper class to handle many scenarios
        Returns:
        null on success or error string on failure.

      • shouldRun

        public boolean shouldRun(ModelEntity modelEntity,
                         ModelIndex modelIndex,
                         DatabaseUtil dbUtil)
        Description copied from interface: IndexAlternativeAction
        This method flags if alternative action should be invoked. This method is only run if index was not created before.

        CONTRACT: This function shouldn't have any side effects as it may get rerun. CONTRACT: Only one alternative action in a entity definition can return true for shouldRun OR IllegalStateException will be thrown.

        Specified by:
        shouldRun in interface IndexAlternativeAction
        Parameters:
        modelEntity - model of entity containing index
        modelIndex - model of index we want to handle alternatively
        dbUtil - database helper class to handle many scenarios
        Returns:
        true if index creation will be handled and ofBiz should not attempt to create index by itself.
